title: When is the 6.18 patch coming to live ?
body: I'd really like to know when this patch is coming out. Ps. Sorry for my english

replies.body: We don't have any information on upcoming or new content.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for patch notes that may come out, and our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for any maintenance announcements as we get closer to rolling out patches.  Hang tight until then!
